H3.text: when does god of war ghost of sparta take place. ancient Greece

A4.text: Loosely based on Greek mythology, Ghost of Sparta is set in ancient Greece with vengeance as its central motif.

A5.text: Ghost of Sparta is set in an alternate version of ancient Greece populated by the Olympian gods, Titans, and other beings from Greek mythology.
